data.route_analysis: Direct flights to Reykjavik from major cities in Europe; bus and car rental options available for local travel.
data.pricing_trends: Prices for flights and accommodations tend to rise during holiday seasons, with the highest prices seen around Christmas and New Year’s.
data.seasonal_patterns: Peak season for Northern Lights is from late September to early April, with optimal conditions typically found in January and February.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking window is 3-6 months in advance for best rates. Last-minute deals may be available but are less predictable.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Direct flights to Reykjavik from major cities in Europe; bus and car rental options available for local travel.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: Peak season for Northern Lights is from late September to early April, with optimal conditions typically found in January and February.
destination_insights.climate: Winter temperatures range from -1°C to 4°C (30°F to 39°F). Snow and ice are common, so warm clothing and reliable footwear are recommended.
destination_insights.culture: Traditional Icelandic festivals in winter include Þorrablót, celebrating the mid-winter. The culture is rich with Viking history and folklore.
destination_insights.attractions: Top attractions include the Golden Circle (Thingvellir, Geysir, Gullfoss), Blue Lagoon, and Northern Lights Viewing Spots.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Prices for flights and accommodations tend to rise during holiday seasons, with the highest prices seen around Christmas and New Year’s.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking window is 3-6 months in advance for best rates. Last-minute deals may be available but are less predictable.
market_insights.demand: Interest in winter travel to Iceland is increasing, especially for unique experiences like the Northern Lights.
market_insights.competition: Competing destinations include Norway and Finland, known for similar winter experiences, but Iceland offers unique geographical features.

trend_insights.market_trends: Growing trend toward experiential travel and eco-tourism, with an emphasis on sustainability.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers increasingly looking for personalized travel packages that cater to unique interests like photography and nature tours.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Iceland is positioning itself strongly due to its accessibility and unique offerings compared to other cold-weather destinations.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Winter provides unique activities such as snowmobiling and ice fishing that are popular among adventure seekers.
